definition: Erst is typically used to indicate that something is happening or being done for the first time, or that it is happening only after a certain point in time or sequence of events. It can also imply that something is happening later than expected or desired.

examples.german: Erst gestern habe ich von der Party erfahren.
examples.english: I only found out about the party yesterday.

examples.german: Erst wenn du deine Hausaufgaben gemacht hast, darfst du spielen.
examples.english: You can only play after you have finished your homework.

examples.german: Erst nach dem Essen können wir spazieren gehen.
examples.english: We can go for a walk only after eating.

examples.german: Erst in der zweiten Hälfte des Films wird es spannend.
examples.english: It only gets exciting in the second half of the movie.

examples.german: Erst wenn du es versuchst, wirst du wissen, ob du es schaffst.
examples.english: You will only know if you can do it once you try.
